page.title: 09Swimming Pool, Haltwhistle
page.content: We are lucky in having an open-air, heated swimming pool. This was built on the site of the former Miner's Welfare. There is a 25m. main pool, a learner pool, a paddling pool, picnic area and a putting green. Open from April to October, the Pool is popular with local people and visitors. Every year in June the swimming pool committee assisted by volunteers help organise a swimming gala. This year,its tenth anniversary, there were 211 competitors and 4 pool records were broken. There were 15 teams entered in the "Its a Knockout" contest which was great fun for the 300 spectators to watch. A video camera was used to record the final events and Â£757 was raised towards pool funds.
